refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function reads MicroDAQ AI (analog inputs) channels. In order to select channels to read an array of channels has to be provided. Analog inputs (AI) can accept 0-5V, 0-10V, ±5V, ±10V, voltage ranges are set depending on 'ai_range' and 'bipolar' parameters. In order to set ±5V or ±10V range 'bipolar' has to set to %T, for single-ended AI configuration 'bipolar' parameter has to be set to %F. The 'differential' parameter sets single ended or differential mode analog input mode
For function usage description call function without parameters. In order to increase AI read performance call mdaq_ai_read with link_id (returned by mdaq_open()).

listitem.para: channels: Single channel of array of channels number to read
ai_range: Analog input range in volts (5 or 10)
bipolar: Bipolar parameter: %T - bipolar AI configuration, %F - unipolar AI configuration
differential: Analog input mode: %T - differential, %F - single ended mode
data: Single value or array with AI voltage values
